title: I can't install League... Again
body:
Long Story Short I need to reinstall League. I did the obligatory run installer etc but when I click the icon on my Desktop I get a message saying

"Could not connect to HTTP Server. Please check that your internet connection is enabled and that your Firewall is not blocking access"

This of course happens every time only this time firewall is turned of but still I get this... any suggestions?

replies.body: Or I can do what any potato with a brain would do and try running the damn thing as administrator.... My bad
Sounds like you were able to get the installer going again, but let me know if you run into any other troubles!
